markdown:
| icon           = poe2 antivenom_icon.png
| description    = Antidotes are a necessity for any traveler in the Deadfire, where venomous wildlife and poisnous plants abound. The balmy climate can also cause even a minor prick of the skin to bloom into a deadly fungal infection. This vial contains an elixir distilled from poisonous compounds. Its deadly properties have been tempered by a skilled alchemist and it now cures rather than kills. This powerful concoction can purge a body of toxic compounds and provide protection against them.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Quick item
| item_type      = Potion
| item_category  = Consumable
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| combat_only    = no
| value          = 50
| shop_value     = 250
| cast_time      = 1.6
| recovery_time  = 3.0
| noise_use      = Quiet
| noise_impact   = Quiet
| duration       = 30.0
| range          = 
| effects        = Immunity to Poison attacks

* {{dmt}} [The Deck of Many Things](/theDeckOfManyThings/): Sold by [Bauble](/bauble/).
| guid           =43149fee-92c8-4c46-9e5a-f52357e0873f
